content:
See US Core MedRequest diff view which is 'all nice and pretty like': http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition-us-core-medicationrequest.html#formal-views-of-profile-content

but now notice how the reference for .medication and .reportedReference are no longer links and render like this :-( : http://build.fhir.org/ig/argonautproject/R4/branches/master/StructureDefinition-us-core-medicationrequest.html#formal-views-of-profile-content

@Lloyd McKenzie do you see the same? Is his a parser issue or do I need to do something differently. I remember something about a change for [x] elements and wonder if this is a result of that?
